data.enText: I made it clear right from the outset that I disapproved.
data.chText: 从一开始我就明确地说我不赞成。

simple_means.memory_skill: out adv.离开 + set vt.设置

data.enText: I made it clear right from the outset that I disapproved.
data.chText: 从一开始我就明确地说我不赞成。

tr: the time at which something is supposed to begin
example: she knew from the get-go that he was the man for her

example.ex: Decide at the outset what kind of learning programme you want to follow...
example.tran: 开始时就选定自己的学习方案。

example.ex: From the outset he had put his trust in me, the son of his old friend.
example.tran: 他从一开始就很信任我这个他老朋友的儿子。

value.def: If something happens at the outset of an event, process, or period of time, it happens at the beginning of it. If something happens from the outset it happens from the beginning and continues to happen.
value.tran: 在开始时/ 从一开始

partsOfSpeech.dec: out adv.离开 + -er 比较级后缀
out adv.离开 + -ing 名词后缀
out adv.离开 + spoken adj.以某种方式说话的
out adv.离开 + let v.允许
